item.description:
We have Moved to A New Bigger Location!!

Update: Please upload a Photo of YOUR FACE so the host[s] and members can recognize you when you walk into the indoor terrace in the Belvidere Arcade, across from the U.S. Post Office in the Belvidere arcade & the South Garden inside The Prudential Center Mall. There are plenty of chairs and cafe tables. Feel free to bring your own food  drinks and Language Based Games.

For a MAP of the Prudential Center Mall click HERE

Transportation: Take the GREEN "E" Line to the "Prudential" T stop or take GREEN "D" or "C" Line to the "HYNES Convention Center" T stop or take the ORANGE Line to the "Back Bay" T stop. Go to the K & ask for directions to U.S. Post Office inside the Prudential Center Mall.

 

Directions HERE

 

Hello all, This Meetup is the regular informal conversation group meeting, at The Prudential Center Mall in Boston's Back Bay. Please print and bring a "Meetup" sign so that you can recognize each other more easily! Meetup Sign: At the top of this page, underneath the "Boston English as a Second Language Group", click on the word "More" then click on the second word down, "Files" you will see two documents, one is the Meetup tabletop sign to print. I hope its helpful! There are usually seats open at the cafe tables which you can pull some tables together. Please introduce yourselves and feel free to ask for help from each other. It is usually helpful if everyone starts with one conversation partner and then changes partners after 15 or 20 minutes! Have fun!

To ESL Students and Facilitators: If you'd like to host your own conversation meeting somewhere, please choose a date, location and time, email Reece and I will email the group! Thanks :)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Boston ESL Signs on the tables on the South Garden Terrace in the Belvidere Arcade (South Garden) across from the US Post Office
